::Magmatron::

    "Megatron, hmmm?" He said, recognizing the voice, it was=
n't the Predacon version, it was the Decpticon version. He knew that Megatr=
on was powerful, and power hungry. He would have to show him that Magmatron=
 and his Destrons would not be betrayed.
    Holo emmiters in all corridors=
 of the ship released a new image. It was of an insect hive, constructed ou=
t of bones. Holo images of Dachande and the Four Nightmares began to crawl =
around the ship, they would not notice anybody, and they are made of light,=
 so, can do no harm, unless you get one in your eye...
    The real Dachand=
e was in Beast Mode as were the Four Nightmares. Dachande went on full Magm=
atron control and began to do what the Nightmares were doing, crawling arou=
nd.
